description.p: Extract the seconds from a date or time value.
Returns the seconds from a date or time value.

discussion.p: The Second function extracts the seconds from a date or time value

example.caption: Second() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, Second(Now()) AS Later FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:42:48 00 pm|48
